section.title: Usage
section.p: The disassembler calls the FCL module if the '-fcl' option is specified. The transistor netlists (in extended spice format), and the behavioural descriptions (in VHDL format) should be placed in a dedicated directory, whose access path is specified by an environment variable. The list of netlists to be identified is specified in a special library file located in the same directory, whose name is specified in an additional environment variable.
